Back to Karol Szymanowski

Karol Szymanowski

Nine Preludes, op. 1

1899–1900 · Michałowski 1

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 17'

  • 1. Andante ma non troppo
  • 2. Andante con moto
  • 3. Andantino
  • 4. Andantino con moto
  • 5. Allegro molto, impetuoso
  • 6. Lento, mesto
  • 7. Moderato
  • 8. Andante ma non troppo
  • 9. Lento, mesto
  • Prelude in C-sharp minor

Recommended editions

  • Complete Edition (PWM) · B 7 · PWM 9268 · Piano Works I · ed. Ewa Bukojemska / Władysław Kędra
  • PWM · PWM 9329 · ed. Ewa Bukojemska

1. Andante ma non troppo

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5

2. Andante con moto

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 3.5

3. Andantino

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 3

4. Andantino con moto

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

5. Allegro molto, impetuoso

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 4

6. Lento, mesto

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5

7. Moderato

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

8. Andante ma non troppo

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 3.5

9. Lento, mesto

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

Prelude in C-sharp minor

There also exists a further prelude in C-sharp minor that was considered for inclusion in this set.

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3.5
